official_title: To establish the Mountaintown National Scenic Area in the Chattahoochee National Forest, Georgia.
short_title: Mountaintown National Scenic Area Act of 2007

summary.text: Mountaintown National Scenic Area Act of 2007 - Establishes the Mountaintown National Scenic Area in the Chattahoochee National Forest in Georgia. Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to develop a management plan for the Scenic Area as an amendment to the land and resource management plan for the Forest.
